name: The Cosmic Adventure
description: A thrilling space exploration film with stunning visuals and deep character development.

description: A heartwarming love story set in the romantic streets of Paris.

description: A suspenseful thriller about a detective uncovering secrets in a haunted mansion.

description: An epic action film about a warrior's journey to save his kingdom from an evil warlord.

description: A magical tale of a young girl who discovers an enchanted forest filled with mystical creatures.

description: A fantasy adventure about a young hero's quest to break a dragon's curse and save his village.

name: Cyber City
